messages.text: Libjulia in master and release-1.6 is broken on macOS for me. AFAICT since the split into libjulia and libjulia-intern (reexported symbols in libjulia are missing leading underscores). See <https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/issues/38925|https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/issues/38925> -- IMHO a release blocker?

messages.text: `doc/build/distributing.md` refers to <https://github.com/staticfloat/julia-nightly-packaging> which was last updated 7 years ago... is that really still used ?!

elements.text: which was last updated 7 years ago... is that really still used ?!

messages.text: I think we should merge <https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/pull/38949> and tag beta when CI passes. It would be good for it to include <https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/pull/38915> but I think it is fine to leave that out in a beta.

messages.text: I think that’s fair.. but I do think #38915 may be ready. <@U687RKK0E> would you be able to review soon?
